summary: Since her childhood, Jessica has been haunted by recurrent nightmares whose meaning escapes her. This peculiarity has led her to study the psychophysiology of dreams and to follow a therapy... See full summary »
cast: Lilly-Fleur Pointeaux|Catriona MacColl|Murray Head|Gala Besson|Fu'ad Aït Aattou|Vernon Dobtcheff|Philippe Nahon|Joe Sheridan|Paul Bandey|Emmanuel Bonami|Shane Woodward|Nathan Willcocks|André Kobtzeff
title: Horsehead
